summary: After creating my 180th character, I decided I needed some new material to work with... here\\\'s what I ended up with!
descriptionHtml:
It gets to that point in one\'s Skyrim experience, when one has to make a new character. For me, this wasn\'t too easy. Almost every possible combination of races and features were taken one at a time. So I made this. So far it adds 5 new playable races from Elder Scrolls Lore. These are Sea Elves, Ka Po\' Tun, Dremora, Xivilai and Elder Nords.
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/70110-1323793508.png[/img]
[b]Maormer - Sea Elves[/b]
There is currently one Sea Elf living in Tamriel. She\'s at a lighthouse near Dawnstar, It\'s going to be a quest to save her but I kinda forgot to finish everything. The Maormer can blend into their surroundings by sneaking thanks to their chameleon-like skin. 

[b]Ka Po\' Tun - The Akavir[/b]
The Ka Po\' Tun (meaning Tiger-Dragon\'s Empire) are an Empire of tiger-like catfolk, I envision them as big bad-ass pussies. Their leader, Tosh Raka can turn into a dragon. It\'s a shame you can\'t. I didn\'t want to add that. Instead, you can summon a little red dragon after you learn \"Fus\".

[b]Dremora - The Common Daedra (Kyn)[/b]
The Kyn are those awesome robot-voiced guys from the Daedric quests.
Y\'know, you kinda ripped off their fashion sense after you cheated your smithing level.

[b]Xivilai - The Blue Daedra from Oblivion[/b]
You remember these spell absorbing powerhouse daedra freaks? That\'s right, I gave it a shot in the CK. Praise me now.

[b]Elder Nords - True Warriors Never Die[/b]
You can finally role play as a creepy old pervert. Enjoy!
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/70110-1323793508.png[/img]
Update Plans: 
- Armour - Alternate Dadric Armour Colours
- Armour - Xivilai Armour
- Armour - Greybeard Robes
- Quest - Save Enial the Maormer Slave
- Dremora - More Hairstyles
- Xivilai - More/Fixed Hairstyles

Current Issues:
- Maormer - Chameleon Effect might not work after a few hours of playtime.
- Xivilai - Hairstyles 1&2 have major clipping issues. More Dremora/Xivilai Hairstyles soon.
- Enial - Enial has a Man\'s Voice. Somehow talks with a gag on...
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/70110-1323793508.png[/img]

author: VenomD95
